name: Perfection of Wisdom
description: *Turn-based 1 vs 1 card battle game. *Total 150 skill cards, no-in-game-charge. *This game has 5 unique characters and each character has its own game system. *Casual card game and at the same time, have deep strategic possibilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 300 MB available space
